description:
Your real-time scores and stats app, fast and simple.

• As fast as a sports app can be. Get updates in real time with Live Activities on your Lock Screen or on match pages with odds, scores, play-by-play and more.
• Follow teams, leagues, divisions and tournaments, and personalise your home view in the app.
• Add a widget to your Home Screen to get quick access to scores and upcoming schedules.
• The best place to be a fan. Watch live matches on Apple TV or catch up on breaking stories with Apple News when you sync your sports.
• Includes Bundesliga, Bundesliga 2, Champions League, Conference League, EFL Championship, EFL Cup, Europa League, F1, FA Cup, FBS and FCS NCAA College Football, LaLiga, Leagues Cup, LIGA MX, Ligue 1, Ligue 2, Men’s College Basketball, Men’s Tennis, MLB, MLS, NASCAR, NBA, NFL, NHL, NWSL, Primeira Liga, Premier League, Segunda División, Serie A, Serie B, WNBA, Women’s Champions League, Women’s College Basketball and Women’s Tennis.

Requirements:
• Availability and features may vary by country, region or device.
• Apple Sports is free to use and is available for all iPhone models using iOS 17.2 or later.
• Features require internet access over a Wi-Fi or mobile data connection.

Discover Playtomic, the app that connects you with an ever-growing community of over 1 million players of padel, tennis, and other racket sports. Enjoy a unique experience with our intuitive and easy-to-use app, which was designed with you in mind.

Find like-minded players in our padel community. Whether you already have friends to play with or are just looking for new partners, Playtomic offers you the chance to connect with people from your club or other padel clubs nearby. What’s more, you can receive personalized recommendations and follow players in your community. The idea is to connect, play and have fun in a social setting! You can also chat with your playing partners and follow their progress too.

Easily organize your perfect match. Create private matches at your favorite padel club or an indoor padel court. Make them public so that other players can join in the fun or you can even join in with an already active match. You have total control over how you play. And if you need help booking a padel court, don’t worry. Playtomic has a wide network of padel clubs and over 16,000 courts worldwide, both indoor and outdoor. You can book a court that suits your needs and wishes. In addition, you will have the option to pay the court fees in full yourself or split them with the other players. A padel court can be yours in the blink of an eye!

If you’re looking for exciting padel leagues and tournaments, Playtomic is the place for you. Show off your talent, improve your game, climb the rankings, and have fun, all while meeting new players and checking out new clubs. It’s the ideal opportunity to grow as a player and dive into the passionate world of padel.

On Playtomic, you can easily and quickly keep track of your progress. Although advanced stats are available with our Premium subscription, even with a free account you can see basic data, such as matches played, won and lost, as well as your recent matches and results. If you want to take your experience to the next level, you can go Premium and unlock all of the exclusive functions.



///////////////////////////// UNLIMITED PREMIUM EXPERIENCE /////////////////////////////

Once you join Premium, you can enjoy a limitless experience. Save money on every transaction and avoid additional court booking fees. Furthermore, you will receive personalized priority alerts. You will be able to select which notifications you want to receive according to your preferences so that you stay up to date on matches, courts, and last-minute opportunities. Your time is money, and it is valuable to us too!

Effectively promote your matches and attract other padel players. Both matches that you create and those that you join will be marked as “Gold Matches”, which will allow other players to easily find them and join in the fun. And to make sure that you always find an available court, we will assign one to you immediately. Pretty cool, no?

Make the most of your performance data and get advanced padel stats. Check out detailed info on your performance, matches, sets, and other interesting metrics. Track your best winning streak, identify your most challenging opponent, and compare your performance with other padel players. 

Challenge yourself, improve your performance, and enjoy the full Playtomic experience. Subscribe now and don’t miss another exciting opportunity in the world of padel!

developer: Union Royale Belge des Societes de Football-Association
description:
Professional and amateur Belgian football at your fingertips? It's in the RBFA app, of course! The official mobile app of the Royal Belgian Football Association is getting a new look, and BBF becomes now RBFA. An app that has been improved in every way!

From news from all the Belgian national teams to exclusive on-demand videos and livestreams, everything is there to give you a unique experience:

Be at the heart of news from RBFA, ACFF and Voetbal Vlaanderen.

Up-to-date match calendars of all Belgian competitions, as well as results and rankings.

On-demand videos and livestreams.

Team line-ups and highlights of each game.

Match facts from our national teams in real time.

Personalized notifications and alerts so you don't miss out on the news that really interests you.

Simplified access to ticketing and webshop.

Games and contests exclusively accessible.

The official app for Globe Soccer Awards.
Celebrities and prestigious nominees from the football world will once again attend the yearly event.

Also, don’t forget to tune in for the streaming video, live from the Awards gala.

The official app allows to:
- Vote for your favourite football stars
- Predict scores from the major leagues
- Keep track of the nominees and winners
- Get directions to the Event venue
- Explore the photo gallery and previous editions' Awards

The official Jude Bellingham app has arrived.  
Step into the world of Jude Bellingham like never before with his brand-new, free official app.  

Whether you're a lifelong fan or just discovering Jude’s journey, this app brings you exclusive behind-the-scenes content, real-time match updates, and in-game stats straight from the pitch.  

Key features: 
•	Exclusive content – Access behind-the-scenes footage of Jude’s life away from the spotlight.  
•	Matches - Receive real-time match updates, Jude’s upcoming fixtures and in-game stats. 
•	Partnerships – Discover Jude’s latest brand collabs and shop his official merchandise all in one place. 
•	Videos – View interviews, training clips and personal moments you won’t find anywhere else. 
•	Jude’s Journey – Relive the highlights, key milestones and unforgettable moments of Jude’s career so far. 
•	Multi-language – Enjoy a seamless experience in your preferred language – choose from English, French, German, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese. 

Wherever you are in the world, the Jude Bellingham app puts you at the heart of his story.  

Download now and stay connected to every moment.

Twizzit is the member management software that optimizes and professionalizes the administration, communication and finances of organizations and federations.

- More than 35 digital tools that automate tasks and save time.
- From CRM and member management, inscriptions, calendar and attendances to invoicing, volunteer management, newsletters and website. Name it, Twizzit has it.
- Brings members, tools and communication together in one app. Extra efficient!
- More than 2400 organizations and 600 000 users preceded you.

Why the Twizzit app is an absolute must-have?
- Your calendar anywhere in your pocket.
- Always up to date with the latest news and last-minute changes via notifications on your smartphone.
- Easily communicate attendances, subscribe, communicate with your team, pay invoices, make a reservation, ... wherever and whenever you want.
- And so much more ... Download the app and discover the benefits for yourself!

Visit www.twizzit.com and find out all about Twizzit.

The 433 app is the ultimate football experience for every football lover. Whether you want to keep track of your team’s big match, stay up to date with all the latest news, kick back and watch some epic viral videos or simply test your footy knowledge with a variety of games… We’ve got you covered. Welcome to the home of football.


MATCH CENTRE
Find everything you need on matchday – fixtures, results, match stats, live line-ups – and get notifications when your teams score. Which team dominated possession? Who had the highest xG? How many of their shots were on target? How many yellow cards did the referee give? It’s all there, and more. 


PREDICTIONS
Think you ‘know ball’ better than your friends? Here’s your chance to prove it! Create leaderboards with your friends and go head-to-head in daily predictions of matches from across the world. Enter into the general leaderboards and compete against all 433 users, with the chance to win prizes.


WALLPAPERS
Need a new football background for your phone? This is the app for you. Wallpapers are released every week, covering all the biggest players, clubs and national sides.


QUIZZES
Put your football knowledge to the test with a series of quizzes, interactive games and brain teasers. Want to find out who knows more about football: You or your friends? You can! Add your friends, complete quizzes, and keep track of each other’s ‘ball knowledge’ with leaderboards.


NEWS
Stay on top of the news and never miss any breaking stories coming out of your favourite clubs and leagues. Keep track of your team’s transfer developments, injury updates, unmissable quotes and reactions from across the football world. Be the first to find out about trending stories or when a transfer is nearing that all important ‘Here we go!’


VIRALS
Want to see goals, saves, moments from games across the world? Want to feel the game from the fan’s perspective? Or do you just want to see some funny moments from famous players and coaches? Then look no further. Find daily uploads of viral moments from across the beautiful game!

À l'occasion des événements sportifs au Maroc, un écosystème numérique innovant a été développé pour offrir aux supporters, visiteurs, volontaires et organisateurs une expérience 100% digitalisée. L'application YALLA est le compagnon de l'ensemble des grands événements sportifs organisés ou coorganisé par la Fédération Royale Marocaine du Football au Maroc.
YALLA offre la possibilité de :
- Créer et gérer le FAN ID, indispensable pour accéder aux stades et Fan Zones
- Déposer une demande d'e-Visa en ligne si nécessaire.
- Accéder aux actualités, programmes et informations pratiques liées aux événements sportifs.
- Consulter les services liés à l'organisation : transport, hébergement et activités.
- Rester informé en temps réel des mises à jour officielles.
YALLA centralise tous les services numériques afin que chaque participant profite pleinement des compétitions sportives au Maroc.

Spond is the best solution for organising sports teams, social groups and group activities. Join hundreds of thousands of members, coaches and parents using Spond every month to organise their groups. Spond is built to support both adult members and parents communicating on behalf of their children.

• Keep track of attendance for matches, trainings and other events
• Spond automatically send reminders to late responders
• Seamless integration with your calendar
• Attendance statistics
• Share information, pictures or updates with posts
• Create polls and let the members vote
• Request payments from members
• Send direct messages and create group chats
• Organise large teams into subgroups
• Support for parents communicating on behalf of their children.
• Import members from Excel, share group links or add members by email/SMS
• Batch create event or import matches from Excel
• Create repeating events for training
• Export participant lists to Excel
• The app is not required - members can receive information by email
• Free to download and use

Arenal is your healthy social network for padel, tennis, squash, soccer5 and padbol players. Set your preferred sport during the sign-up process and 'play with us' at one of our 9 clubs.

CONNECT WITH PLAYERS
Arenal allows you to find friends from your contacts list, connect with suggested players & players nearby and follow them for easy gameplay, chatting and tracking progress. Because "Winning is only half of it. Having fun is the other half."

PLAY PERFECT GAMES
Organize a match with friends, find additional players to join your match, or locate active matches to join... all this is possible with just a few clicks using the Arenal app. There's always a game nearby to enjoy! 

BOOK JOBS IN THE NEIGHBORHOOD
Uncertain of where to play? Reserve a field at your preferred club or check out which Arenal clubs are nearby. Whether you pay for the entire booking or split the payment with other players, the field is yours to enjoy!

REGISTER FOR COMPETITIONS
Are you looking to improve your skills, compete on the field, increase your ranking, have fun, meet new players, and discover other Arenal clubs? Participate in Arenal leagues and tournaments; it's a great opportunity to unleash your inner talent. Join Arenal, and play with us!

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
Keep a convenient record of the matches you've played, won, lost, or view your recent results.

With the ProSoccerData (PSD) application, you can register or consult all relevant information linked to your club or federation:
 
- Consult club or team calendar
- Communicate via e-mail or chat
- Report absences as a player or staff member
- Create new activities
- Prepare your training sessions
- Create a match report
- Switch easily between different user profiles

Stay ahead of every sporting moment with live scores, stats, and schedules. Follow the biggest leagues in the world, including the Premier League, Champions League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Brasileirão Série A, and Ligue 1. Track every phase of the NBA, EuroLeague, NCAA, and top tennis tournaments like Wimbledon, Roland Garros, US Open, Australian Open, and the ATP & WTA Tours—all in one app.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
• Handball - IHF World Handball Championship, Bundesliga, EHF Champions League
• Volleyball - FIVB Volleyball World Championship, Nations League, Champions League
• Baseball - MLB, LMB, Pro Yakyu - NPB
• American Football - NFL, NCAA
• MMA - UFC, Bellator, KSW, Rizin, PFL
• Motorsport - Formula 1, NASCAR, MotoGP, WRC
• Cricket - ICC World Cup, Indian Premier League (IPL)

and the rest of the sports we cover - Rugby, Darts, Snooker, Futsal, Minifootball, Badminton, Aussie Rules, Beach Volleyball, Water polo, Cycling, Floorball, Bandy.

Your ultimate live scores and sports news app. Goals, scores, and stories, all on Flashscore. Follow all the latest highlights across the world of sport, including football, tennis, basketball, hockey and much more. Choose from 30+ sports and 6000+ competitions and our tailored notifications will let you know about every important action of the match. 
 
Download Flashscore now and read the game like no one else!

Key features:
• Fastest live results: Get real-time updates with detailed statistics, xG data, unique player and team ratings, live standings and match updates.
• In-depth sports news: Stay informed with exclusive interviews, transfer news & rumours, and in-depth data analysis.
• Personalized favourites: Receive top news notifications, goal alerts, and customized reminders for your favourite teams, competitions or matches.
• Follow your favourite players: Add them to your list and allow notifications so that you never miss their presence in the starting lineup, goals, bookings or ratings.
• Expert match previews: Access selected opportunities and stats to enhance your sports prediction accuracy.
• Predicted lineups: Stay one step ahead and find out who is likely to start in the upcoming match given current form, unexpected injuries or lineup changes.
• Detailed player stats: Check out expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), the number of shots, passes, touches, chances created, tackles, saves and other key statistics for all the players that appear on the pitch.

LIVE SPORTS SCORES & NEWS, FAST AND ACCURATE

• SPEED: Whether a goal is scored, red card issued, set or period is over, you will know at the same time as the live audience.

• DATA-DRIVEN NEWS: Breaking news and detailed coverage with unique sports data visualizations, tactical insights, expert opinions or featured articles.

• GREAT COVERAGE: You can find football live scores, tennis scores, basketball results, hockey online, golf leaderboard and more than 30 other sports (snooker, baseball, MMA ...) in our app. 


Coverage of major global events & local competitions: 
Football: Premier League, Championship, League One, League Two, FA Cup, LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Champions League (UCL), Europa League, Europa Conference League, Club World Cup
Tennis: ATP/WTA Tour tournaments including Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), ATP Finals, Davis Cup
Basketball: NBA, Euroleague, ACB, LNB, Lega A, World Cup
Hockey: NHL, DEL, SHL, IIHF World Championship
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam, World Matchplay, UK Open, World Grand Prix
Golf: British Open (The Open), Masters, US Open, PGA Championship, Ryder Cup, Players Championship
Baseball: MLB, KBO, NPB, KBO, LVBP, LMB, World Baseball Classic
Snooker: World Championship, UK Championship, The Masters
Volleyball: SuperLega, Nations League, Nations League Women, CEV Champions League
Badminton: BWF World Championships, Thomas Cup, Uber Cup, Sudirman Cup
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam
Motorsport: Formula 1 (F1), MotoGP, Moto2, Nascar, Dakar
MMA: UFC, Bellator MMA, KSW, Оktagon MMA, PFL, ONE Championship


NO MORE MISSED MATCHES OR UPDATES

• FAVOURITE TEAMS AND MATCHES: Don’t waste your time, and follow only your favourite matches, teams and competitions.

• NOTIFICATIONS AND ALERTS: Match starts, line-ups, goals - you will not miss any of it again. Just select your favorite matches and wait for your mobile device to let you know.


LIVE RESULTS, TABLES AND MATCH DETAILS

• LIVE COMMENTARY: Unable to watch the match on TV? No problem: stay up-to-date with our detailed live text commentary.

• LIVE TABLES: One goal can change a lot. Our live standings will show you if a scored goal has changed the league ranking, as well as the current top scorers table.


Terms of Use: https://livesport.eu/terms-of-use/en-gb
Privacy Policy: https://livesport.eu/privacy-policy/en-gb

The best management app for all sports clubs and teams to spend more time playing the game they love!

Provide your club managers, coaches, volunteers and players with a stress reducing app allowing them to easily invite players to upcoming games and practices, communicate with players, parents and staff, and keep up with team and individual stats.

Whether a board member, coach or player, you’ll have access to all club and team information, wherever, whenever.

You practice your sport for leisure or in competition? In a local or national league? SportEasy adapts to your needs.

--------------------------

Features

With SportEasy you can manage your:

EVENTS:
- view all team events on a shared calendar
- view the date, start time, location, venue, for each event
- view the list of participants/absences
- view and share your team lineup

INVITATIONS TO EVENTS:
- receive notifications for upcoming games, practices, tournaments
- set your availability for an event

MESSAGES :
- chat with your players, teammates, coaches, parents
- receive important messages from the coach

STATISTICS:
- see the score/results, the scorers, the assists, etc.
- rate the game, rate the players, vote for the most valuable player (MVP)

--------------------------

SportEasy for everyone, everywhere!

CLUB : manage multiple teams from the same club on SportEasy. Club leaders and volunteers love SportEasy too.

GROUP OF FRIENDS : you are meeting with friends every week to play soccer, football basketball? SportEasy is going to be your new BFF.

COMPANY: you practice your sport at work, with colleagues? SportEasy brings happiness to the office.

SCHOOL/UNIVERSITY : you are member of a school team, or university team? SportEasy equals more free time, to study and focus on your next class.

RECREATIONAL TEAM : you play the game for fun and to make friends? SportEasy is the app for you!
SportEasy is for men and women, adult or child. You can use the app from home, at the office, the gym, the stadium, by the field, by the court, in the locker-room, while commuting, at the beach, etc.

--------------------------

SportEasy and your sport

SportEasy is available for teams and clubs in the following sports: baseball, basketball, cricket, floorball, football, australian football, handball, field hockey, ice hockey, kayak polo, lacrosse, polo, roller hockey, rugby, soccer, street hockey, ultimate, volleyball, water-polo.
The app is also available for all other sports (including individual sports): tennis, table tennis (ping pong), golf, wrestling, gymnastics, etc.

--------------------------

Upcoming features

SportEasy is updated on a regular basis, for the greater good, and for ours too to be honest.
We plan to add new features in the coming months:
manage/edit all the profile information of a team member
send reminders for the games as text messages
synchronize the SportEasy calendar with your smartphone calendar

--------------------------

PREMIUM Subscription

For all members of the team, 9.99€ / month:
- All Standard features
- No banner ads
- Unlimited number of members
- Player stats
- Assignments
- Live feed: timeline & stats
- Priority support
- Player profile customization
- Attendance report

One payment for all members of the team.
Automatic renewal. Cancellation possible at any time.

Subscription charged in one payment. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, at the same price you initially paid. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase.

Target DartCounter is the world’s biggest darts scorer app for keeping track of all your scores. Play x01 games, Cricket, Around the Clock and several other training games.
Play online against your friends or challenge the computer dartbot.
In the x01 games you will hear the voice of MasterCaller Ray Martin who will announce your name and all your scores.

Register or log in and all your games will be saved.
Play with multiple players with a DartCounter account and the whole game will be saved in both accounts.

IN-APP PURCHASES 
The app offers one in-app purchases; "Ultimate Yearly" and "Ultimate Monthly". These are annual  and monthly auto renewable subscription which gives you access to more features and statistics to improve your darts skills.

When you own this subscription you will get the newest gameplays earlier than the users without the subscription. Also, we will keep adding more Ultimate features in the future updates to make the usage easier, more detailed and even more fun!

GENERAL PAYMENT INFORMATION
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase


PRICING
The Ultimate Yearly subscription costs $34.99 USD each year, the Ultimate Monthly subscription costs $4.99 USD each year. This will be automatically converted to your own currency by iTunes. For more information about the annual payment or how to cancel auto renewing, read "Payment & Cancellation".


PAYMENT & CANCELLATION
The payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

24 hours before the end of each subscription period (one year) you'll automatically be charged the same amount as you've paid for the initial purchase.
After renewing, your subscription will be valid for another year.

You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes/App Store account settings; 
you must do so at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period to avoid being billed for the next cycle. 
-------------------------------------------------

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

Watch live football matches on FIFA+ - Stream soccer matches, replays, highlights, scores, and exclusive content anytime, anywhere.
The FIFA+ app is your official home for live football, match replays and the game’s greatest stories. With a bold new design and powerful new features, FIFA+ brings you closer to the sport you love - From FIFA World Cup™ moments to live matches across the globe. This autumn, you can stream the FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™, FIFA U-17 Women’s World Cup Morocco 2025 and FIFA U-17 Men’s World Cup Quatar exclusively on Fifa+ in selected countries with many more competitions to come!

Live Football Streaming Worldwide
Stream thousands of live football matches from over 230 competitions and 100+ Football Associations. FIFA+ offers unrivalled coverage of men’s and women’s FIFA tournaments, youth competitions including the FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™ and FIFA World Cup™ Qualifiers in selected countries.
- Watch live football and soccer matches from around the world
- Follow the road to FIFA World Cup 26™ with live qualifiers and match highlights
- The official home of Classic FIFA World Cup™ matches and original documentaries
- Get live match updates, scores and kick-off alerts instantly

Match Replays, Highlights and FIFA World Cup™ Archive
Missed a game? Relive the match day action with full game replays, match highlights, and expert commentary. Re-watch iconic FIFA World Cup™ moments and explore the football archive to watch historic games and unforgettable goals! With in-depth highlights and detailed post-match analysis, you’ll never miss a thing.

Original Football Content and Stories
Go beyond the pitch with exclusive documentaries, player profiles and untold stories from around the world of football. Discover original series that dive into the stories of legendary players, rivalries and soccer teams from around the world.

Access premium content only available on FIFA+
- Match alerts and notifications: Never miss a goal or kick-off.
- Watch from the start: Rewind live tournament match streams so you can catch up on games
at your convenience.
- Watch next: Get automatic content suggestions tailored to your viewing.
- Improved search and filters: Easily find teams, matches, tournaments and highlights.
- Simple sign-in: Use your FIFA ID to unlock full access to the FIFA+ streaming app.

THE OFFICIAL FOOTBALL STREAMING APP BY FIFA
Stream live football, match replays and FIFA World Cup™ highlights right from your phone. FIFA+ is the only official FIFA app with exclusive access to tournaments and global
competitions.
Download the FIFA+ app today and stream live football, match highlights, documentaries and FIFA World Cup™ content - All in one place. Experience the world’s game, your way.

Warning ! This app is only for sports enthusiasts!

The Ultimate Sports Entertainment Platform

DAZN is the only truly global pure-play sports entertainment platform. We uniquely integrate the entire fan experience for fans to watch, play, and socialize, all in one place.

Watch Anytime, Anywhere.
Experience sports like never before. Stream your favourite events live or on demand, on any device, from anywhere in the world. DAZN delivers the game to you, wherever you are.

Play in FanZone and Beyond
Dive into the action with FanZone. Chat live, send reactions, and connect with fellow fans in real-time. It’s your front-row seat to the heart of the game.

Connect with Fans
Join the community. Chat with fans, share your passion, and celebrate every victory together. On DAZN, every game is a social event.

DAZN brings you the ultimate sports streaming experience with a world of content available anytime, anywhere:

• Dive into the “Home of Boxing”, featuring top events, schedules, fighter profiles, and exclusive content, including Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship (BKFC).
• Stay up-to-date with the “Schedule” feature, setting alerts for your favourite games across sports like American Football, Basketball, and Tennis.
• Navigate effortlessly with the new sub-navigation bar to quickly access your favourite competitions like Serie A. 
• Get real-time “Stats and Scores” for all games, including Men’s Football, the National League, and major tournaments like the NFL Game Pass and Courtside 1891.
• Explore full “Fight Cards” for boxing and MMA events, including the Professional Fighters League (PFL), and revisit past rounds with a single click.
• Engage with fans in the “FanZone” by cheering, chatting, sending reactions, and participating in polls.
• Manage your account with ease using the updated profile section.
• Browse and watch a variety of live channels with the EPG for live channels feature, including content from Red Bull TV, Padel TIME TV, and thrilling events like Riyadh Season.

DAZN holds the world’s largest portfolio of sports broadcasting rights, including:
• History-making fights from Matchroom Promotions, Queensbury, Golden Boy Promotions, and BKFC.
• Exclusive access to NFL Game Pass, bringing every game of the NFL.
• European football including Serie A and National League.
• NHL.TV: Experience every game from every team, live and on demand all season long. The world’s best hockey, all in one place.
• All the action from the NCAA College Football season.
• Basketball action, including Courtside 1891.
• The best of live Women’s Football, including Liga F, NWSL, and Frauen-Bundesliga.
• Exciting MMA content from the Professional Fighters League (PFL), Naciones MMA, and more.
• Unique sports like Padel, global tournaments in Tennis, and diverse events like Riyadh Season.
• Over 10 linear TV channels on our platform with 24/7 content, including Red Bull TV, Matchroom Snooker, Lacrosse TV, and more.
• A rich library of video-on-demand (VOD) content, including sports documentaries, features, and shows.

DAZN is your gateway to sports, bringing you closer to the action than ever before.

Met de Sporza app beleef je je favoriete sporten live, herbeleef je de beste fragmenten opnieuw & opnieuw en zie je wat je eerst niet zag dankzij de scherpste analyses.

Mis geen enkele wedstrijd van jouw favoriete wedstrijdkalender. Volg de Jupiler Pro League vanop de eerste rij, geniet van de Rode Duivels, supporter mee tijdens de wielerklassiekers en kijk vol spanning naar bloedstollende tennismatchen. En staat jouw lievelingssport niet altijd in the picture? Wel, ze staat zeker in de Sporza app.

Met je persoonlijk nieuwsoverzicht en onze berichtjes naar jou, ben je bovendien steeds als eerste op de hoogte van nieuwtjes over jouw favoriete sporten.

Je hebt onze live-verslaggeving, samenvattingen, hoogtepunten, klassementen en opstellingen, altijd handig op zak. Bekijk en beluister ons interactieve aanbod via livestreams, programma's, video's en podcasts waar en wanneer het jou past.

LiveScore keeps you up to date with the latest live sports scores and live sports action. Whether you are looking for scores, goals, fixtures or news, LiveScore is your one-stop destination for top football leagues. From Premier League and UEFA Champions League, to Eredivisie, Serie A, LaLiga and more, LiveScore has it all. Stay on top of the football season with live football scores!

LIVE NOTIFICATIONS
Get fast updates to keep track of live sports scores, goals, red cards and more for multiple matches and sports at the same time. Get all the details, football stats and live football scores for the Premier League, UEFA Champions League; scores for tennis matches and more. Manage your favourite sports & match notifications in your settings.

FOR YOU
Immerse yourself in a truly personalised experience when it comes to news and headlines. With all your favourites in one place, it’s the best way for you to cut the noise and stay informed on the teams and competitions that matter to you. Check the latest news and breaking headlines from across the world of sport. After all, it's made For You.

For You covers everything from the latest insights, football news, football stats, football results, post-match reviews, player transfers and previews of upcoming football fixtures from the PL, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Primeira Liga and Eredivisie.

COMPETITIONS
Search for competitions across the biggest sports. Including worldwide premier cups and leagues with match details and soccer and football scores for the PL, the FA Cup, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Serie A, Eredivisie and Bundesliga.

FAVOURITE LEAGUES AND TEAMS
Get to the scores, live results and sports match news you’re interested in. Favourite your team to follow their progress in the leagues and easily see past results or upcoming fixtures. Switch on live notifications for your favourited teams to keep track of all the action & news.

TEAM PAGES AND PLAYER STATS
View your team’s upcoming fixtures, live table standings, news, scores, videos of matches and Player Stats to check top scorers and more. Perfect for keeping up with news and scores of your favourite tennis players, or for your fantasy football team.

LIVE COMMENTARY (Unofficial) FROM LIVESCORE
Listen to live match commentary (unofficial) from the LiveScore team, covering everything from scores, assists, corners, cards and descriptions of the action on football matches.

WORLDWIDE SCORES AND SPORT
Find your international team and follow live football stats, football results and scores. More than 1,000 live football scores and football fixtures are followed every week.

LIVESCORE HORSE RACING
View horse racing results, upcoming race details, jockey, trainer and horse racing form details across UK, Ireland and international racecourses. Favourite upcoming horse races to easily view every horse and jockey in the field, receive live notifications with the winning horse.

DISCOVER AMERICAN FOOTBALL
New to LiveScore is American Football! Whether you're a seasoned fan or new to the game, we've got you covered with real-time game results, stats, and fixtures for your favourite teams and leagues, including the NFL & CFL. Stay updated on the action and follow every touchdown, tackle and triumph.

ABOUT LIVESCORE
Since 1998, LiveScore has been giving you real-time delivery of live sport scores & data. As leaders of live score updates, LiveScore is trusted and used daily by millions of users globally; specialising in the sports: football, soccer, tennis, cricket, basketball & hockey.
